snippet: British authorities on Tuesday raided a slaughterhouse and a meat processing company suspected of selling horse meat labeled beef for kebabs and burgers.
abstract: British authorities raid slaughterhouse and meat processing company suspected of selling horse meat labeled beef for kebabs and burgers, shutting them down and seizing meat.
lead_paragraph: British authorities on Tuesday raided a slaughterhouse and a meat processing company suspected of selling horse meat labeled beef for kebabs and burgers.

headline.main: Britain: Slaughterhouse and Meat Company Are Shut on Suspicion of Selling Horse Meat as Burger Beef
headline.print_headline: Britain: Slaughterhouse and Meat Company Are Shut On Suspicion of Selling Horse Meat as Burger Beef
